name: Swift
headerSeo: The Maruti Suzuki Swift is India's most popular premium hatchback, known for its sporty design, fuel efficiency, and fun-to-drive nature. Available with petrol and CNG options.
pros:
• Sporty and stylish design
• Excellent fuel efficiency (22-25 kmpl)
• Fun-to-drive with peppy engine
• Spacious cabin for its segment
• Low maintenance costs
• Wide service network
cons:
• Limited boot space (265L)
• Basic features in lower variants
• No diesel option available
• Rear seat comfort could be better
description: The Maruti Suzuki Swift is a premium hatchback that has been a bestseller in India for over a decade. It combines sporty styling with practical features and excellent fuel efficiency. The latest generation Swift comes with a 1.2L petrol engine producing 90 PS, available with both manual and AMT automatic transmissions. The car is known for its peppy performance, light steering, and nimble handling that makes it perfect for city driving. With its iconic design, reliable engine, and low running costs, the Swift continues to be a favorite among young buyers and families alike.
exteriorDesign: The Swift features a bold and sporty exterior design with a signature hexagonal grille, swept-back headlamps with LED DRLs, and flowing character lines. The muscular wheel arches house stylish 15-inch alloy wheels. The rear gets wraparound LED tail lamps and a sporty bumper design. Available in vibrant color options, the Swift's design appeals to young, dynamic buyers.
comfortConvenience: Inside, the Swift offers a well-designed cabin with a dual-tone black and beige theme. The dashboard features a 7-inch SmartPlay touchscreen infotainment system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto. Other comfort features include automatic climate control, steering-mounted controls, height-adjustable driver seat, and rear AC vents. The cabin is spacious for four adults with adequate headroom and legroom.

Prices may vary based on your city and chosen variant."},{"question":"What is the mileage of Maruti Suzuki Swift?","answer":"The Maruti Suzuki Swift delivers an ARAI-certified mileage of 25.75 kmpl for both manual and AMT variants. Real-world mileage ranges from 18-20 kmpl in city and 22-24 kmpl on highways."},{"question":"Is Maruti Swift a good car to buy?","answer":"Yes, the Maruti Suzuki Swift is an excellent choice for those looking for a stylish, fuel-efficient, and fun-to-drive hatchback. name: Creta
headerSeo: The Hyundai Creta is India's best-selling compact SUV, offering premium features, powerful engines, and a commanding road presence. Available in petrol, diesel, and turbo-petrol variants.
pros:
• Premium and feature-rich cabin
• Multiple engine and transmission options
• Spacious and comfortable for 5 adults
• Strong build quality and safety features
• Good ground clearance (190mm)
• Excellent after-sales service
cons:
• Higher price compared to rivals
• Diesel variant could be more fuel-efficient
• Turbo-petrol only in top variants
• Rear AC vents only in higher variants
description: The Hyundai Creta is a premium compact SUV that has dominated the Indian market since its launch. It offers a perfect blend of style, comfort, features, and performance. Available with three engine options - 1.5L petrol, 1.5L diesel, and 1.5L turbo-petrol - the Creta caters to diverse customer needs. The cabin is loaded with premium features including a 10.25-inch touchscreen, panoramic sunroof, ventilated seats, wireless charging, and Level 1 ADAS. With its commanding road presence, spacious cabin, and comprehensive safety features, the Creta continues to be the benchmark in its segment.
exteriorDesign: The Creta sports a bold and muscular design with Hyundai's signature parametric grille, split LED headlamps with DRLs, and a sculpted hood. The side profile features strong character lines, 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels, and chrome door handles. The rear gets connected LED tail lamps and a sporty bumper with skid plate. The SUV stance with 190mm ground clearance gives it a commanding presence.
comfortConvenience: The Creta's cabin is premium and spacious with dual-tone black and grey interiors. Key features include a 10.25-inch touchscreen infotainment, digital instrument cluster, panoramic sunroof, ventilated front seats, wireless phone charger, ambient lighting, and automatic climate control. The rear seats are spacious with good legroom and recline function. Boot space of 433 liters is class-leading.

name: Nexon
headerSeo: The Tata Nexon is India's safest compact SUV with a 5-star Global NCAP rating. Available in petrol, diesel, and electric variants, it offers great value with premium features.
pros:
• 5-star Global NCAP safety rating
• Spacious and premium cabin
• Available in petrol, diesel, and EV
• Feature-rich across variants
• Strong build quality
• Competitive pricing
cons:
• Diesel engine can be noisy
• Ride quality could be better
• Infotainment system needs improvement
• Rear seat comfort average
description: The Tata Nexon is a compact SUV that has set new benchmarks in safety with its 5-star Global NCAP rating. It offers a perfect blend of style, safety, and features at a competitive price. Available with 1.2L turbo-petrol and 1.5L diesel engines, the Nexon caters to both performance and efficiency seekers. The cabin is spacious and well-equipped with features like a 10.25-inch touchscreen, digital instrument cluster, panoramic sunroof, and ventilated seats. The Nexon also offers an electric variant (Nexon EV) for eco-conscious buyers. With its robust build, comprehensive safety features, and attractive pricing, the Nexon is a strong contender in the compact SUV segment.
exteriorDesign: The Nexon features Tata's Impact 2.0 design language with a bold front grille, projector headlamps, and LED DRLs. The muscular wheel arches house 16-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels. The side profile gets strong character lines and black cladding. The rear features wraparound LED tail lamps and a sporty bumper. Available in dual-tone color options with contrasting roof.
comfortConvenience: The Nexon's cabin is modern and spacious with a dual-tone black and white theme. Key features include a 10.25-inch touchscreen with Android Auto and Apple CarPlay, digital instrument cluster, automatic climate control, cruise control, and push-button start. Higher variants get panoramic sunroof, ventilated front seats, wireless charger, and ambient lighting. The rear seats are spacious with good legroom.
